changeSet.author: pompei
changeSet.sql: create table booking ( booking_id serial primary key, number_of_people int, record_time date, record_date_day varchar(100), record_date_from varchar(100), record_date_to varchar(100), table_type varchar(100), phone_number varchar(100), customer_id int, foreign key(customer_id) references customer(customer_id) )

changeSet.author: pompei
changeSet.sql: create table order_status ( order_status_id serial primary key, oorder_id int, order_item_id int, update_date date, status varchar(100), foreign key(order_item_id) references order_items(order_item_id), foreign key(oorder_id) references oorder(oorder_id) )
